pages.text: Quintupling ores is quite complicated, however it can lead to huge riches, especially with a $(l:block/digital_miner)Digital Miner$(/l).

To quintuple ores, put them and $(l:gas/sulfuric_acid)Sulfuric Acid$(/l) into a $(l:block/chemical_dissolution_chamber)Chemical Dissolution Chamber$(/l), which will convert them into slurry.  Clean the slurry in a $(l:block/chemical_washer)Chemical Washer$(/l), then use a $(l:block/chemical_crystallizer)Chemical Crystallizer$(/l) to turn them into crystals.
Put the crystals into your injection chamber.
